mapper.select: SELECT ba.ba_avg_rent_fee AS avgRentFee, ba.ba_total_workplace_population AS totalWorkplacePopulation, ba.ba_total_expenditure AS totalExpenditure, ba.ba_attraction_count AS attractionCount, bs.bs_avg_monthly_sales_score AS avgMonthlySales, (ba.ba_total_resident_population + ba.ba_total_floating_population) AS 기타 FROM bizone_admin ba LEFT JOIN bizone_score bs ON ba.ba_code = bs.ba_code WHERE ba.ba_code = #{admin_code} AND bs.bb_code = #{service_code}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM( bs_other_score_1 + bs_other_score_2 + bs_other_score_3 + ba_other_score_1 + ba_other_score_2 + ba_other_score_3), 0) AS otherScoresTotal FROM bizone_score bs JOIN bizone_admin ba ON bs.ba_code = ba.ba_code WHERE bs.bb_code = #{service_code} AND ba.ba_code = #{admin_code}
